title: Viruses are falling from the sky - in their billions
text:
Viruses are falling from the sky - in their billions Friday, March 16, 2018 - 01:24 
Millions of types of virus and bacteria, including deadly varieties, are being swept up into the atmosphere in small particles from soil-dust and sea spray and being transported to other parts of the globe, according to new research. Jim Drury reports.
